headline: SMMT Stock Plummets 25% on Regional Data Differences in NSCLC Study
summary: Summit Therapeutics plunges 25% after its HARMONi study shows sharp regional differences in lung cancer trial outcomes.

headline: Will Merck's Cost Cuts and New Drug Approvals Ease Headwinds?
summary: MRK expects strong Keytruda sales, new drug launches and $3B in planned cost savings to offset pressure from declining Gardasil sales and other headwinds.
